name: styled-components-extractor
description: Generate styled-components from JSX tags. A faster styled-component workflow.

commands.title: Extract styled-components to the same file
Extract exported styled-components to a separate file

styledComponentsExtractor.separateFile.m.markdownDescription: Matches files that are eligible for extraction. The match pattern excludes the extension. You can use `*` as a wildcard. Only applies when extracting to a separate file.

styledComponentsExtractor.separateFile.o.markdownDescription: The name of the file, excluding the extension, to place extracted components extracting to a separate file. You can use `$1`, `$2`, etc to match the contents of each wildcard from `matchPattern`, allowing you to name the file based on the file the component was extracted from.

styledComponentsExtractor.addImportState.markdownDescription: Add `import styled from 'styled-component'` statement if variable `styled` is unbound. Only applies when extracting to clipboard.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run test
